sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, Image} from 'react-native'
import React from 'react'

const ThemBanQR = () => {
  return (
    <View style={{flex:1, backgroundColor:'#E5E9EB'}}>
     <View style={{height:200, backgroundColor:'white', justifyContent:'center', alignItems:'center'}}>
        <View style={{height:150,width:170 ,backgroundColor:"#447FAC", borderRadius:20, justifyContent:'center', alignItems:'center'}}>
            <Text style={{fontSize:20}}>Meo Meo</Text>
          <Image source={{ uri: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRP9K07HCn8Ia93xqZUHwjXID8gc3EUsasv7Q&usqp=CAU' }} style={{ height: 80, width:80, resizeMode: 'cover' }} />
          <Text style={{fontSize:10}}>Quét mã để thêm bạn Zalo với tôi</Text>
        </View>
     </View>
     <View style={{height:50, backgroundColor:'white', marginTop:2}}>
     <TextInput style={{ height: 45, width: '100%', paddingLeft: 40, borderRadius: 10, color: 'black', backgroundColor: '#F2F2F2' }} placeholder='Tìm tên hoặc số điện thoại' placeholderTextColor={'#8B8B8B'} />
     </View>
    </View>
  )
}

export default ThemBanQR
